TWOFACTORAUTH.HINT_INSERT_TOUCH_SECURITY_KEY: Insert your security key into the USB port and touch it
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_SECURITY_KEY_ERROR_VERIFICATION: Try using your security key again or try another way to verify it's you
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_SECURITY_KEY_ERROR_VERIFICATION_NO_: Try using your security key again to verify it's you
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_SECURITY_KEY_ERROR_HTTPS_NEEDED: For Security key functionality to work, make sure you load this application via https, not http
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_SECURITY_KEY_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED: Your current browser doesn't support adding Security Keys. Please try a different browser, for example Google Chrome
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_AUTHENTICATOR_APP_VERIFICATION: Specify verification code from Authenticator app
TWOFACTORAUTH.LABEL_TRUST_DEVICE_PLURAL: Don't ask again on this device for {COUNT} day|Don't ask again on this device for {COUNT} days
TWOFACTORAUTH.CONFIRM_LOGOUT_DEVICE: You'll need to sign in again on that device.
TWOFACTORAUTH.ERROR_LOGOUT_DEVICE: Error occurred while logging out from device.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_TRUST_DEVICES: Two factor verification will be skipped on devices you trust.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_REVOKE_ALL: You can revoke trusted status from your devices that skip Two factor Verification.
TWOFACTORAUTH.CONFIRM_REVOKE_ALL: To sign in again, you'll need to provide a second factor.
TWOFACTORAUTH.ERROR_REVOKE_TRUST: Error occurred while revoking trust from devices.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_EMPTY_ALLOWLIST: IP allowlist is empty. If you want to restrict access to your account from unknown IP address you can add your working IP addresses to the allowlist.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_ALLOWLIST: The system will not work unless you're connected throught one of these IP addresses.
TWOFACTORAUTH.ERROR_CANNOT_GET_IP_ALLOWLIST: Error occured while getting IP allowlist
TWOFACTORAUTH.HINT_ADD_IP: Enter IP address which will be allowed to use this system
TWOFACTORAUTH.CONFIRM_NOT_CURRENT_IP: Your current IP address is {CURRENTIP} and you're trying to add some other IP address. If you want to proceed with that you will lose current session and access to the system via current IP address.
TWOFACTORAUTH.ERROR_ADD_IP: Error occured while adding IP address
TWOFACTORAUTH.CONFIRM_REMOVE_IP: You won't be able to use the system via this IP address.
TWOFACTORAUTH.CONFIRM_REMOVE_CURRENT_IP: Note that you are about to delete current IP address from allowlist. After that you will be signed out. Also you won't be able to use the system via this IP address.
TWOFACTORAUTH.ERROR_REMOVE_IP: Error occured while removing IP address
TWOFACTORAUTH.ERROR_IP_IS_NOT_ALLOWED: Your IP address is not allowed
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_IP_ALLOWLIST_ENABLED_FOR_USER: IP allowlist is enabled for {USER} user.
TWOFACTORAUTH.INFO_IP_ALLOWLIST_DISABLED_FOR_USER: IP allowlist is not enabled for {USER} user.
TWOFACTORAUTH.CONFIRM_DISABLE_IP_ALLOWLIST: Are you sure you want to turn off IP allowlist for {USER} user?
TWOFACTORAUTH.REPORT_DISABLE_USER_IP_ALLOWLIST: IP allowlist was successfully turned off for {USER} user.
TWOFACTORAUTH.ERROR_DISABLE_USER_IP_ALLOWLIST: Error occurred while turning off IP allowlist for {USER} user.
